attributes.action: Give Kevin Sinfield an knighthood for services to the MND community
attributes.additional_details: He has raised millions of pounds not only in memory of his great friend Rob Burrows but also for the MND community and for research into this terrible disease.
attributes.background: Put pressure on the King to give Kevin Sinfield an knighthood for services to the MND community

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
